short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one and the value will double.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one and the value will double.
